code: import axios from"axios";export default{googleBooks:function googleBooks(query){return axios.get("https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q=".concat(query));},getBook:function getBook(id){return axios.get("/api/books/"+id);},getBooks:function getBooks(){return axios.get("/api/books");},saveBook:function saveBook(bookData){return axios.post("/api/books",bookData);},deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/api/books/"+id);}};
